com.intland.codebeamer.manager

Class TrackerItemManager.EscalationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.manager.TrackerItemManager.EscalationLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    TrackerItemManager

    public class TrackerItemManager.EscalationLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A special Runnable that periodically loads the next chunk of scheduled task escalations from the database and feeds them into the ScheduledExecutorService queue.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TrackerItemManager.EscalationLoader()

      Create the appropriate trigger for the specified escalation
      void done(TrackerItemEscalationScheduleDto escalation)
      EscalationTrigger callback to remove a fired escalation from the scheduled map
      void run()
      Load all pending escalations due within the next 90s into the executor queue

      • cancelAll

        public void cancelAll(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> itemIds)
        Remove all escalations of the specified items from the internal execution queue. Note: As long as the escalations remain in the database, the next run() will load them again, but this is usefull to prevent race conditions while updating items.
        Parameters:
        itemIds - is a Collection with the Ids of items whose escalations to remove
